channel.title: New Civil Protection
channel.description:
For those who don't know, Civil Protection is made by the same guy who makes Freemans Mind, Ross Scott. Anyways, I didn't see a thread about these spectacular videos so I decided make one myself. And what better time to make on than the day a new episode comes out!
Here's Ross Scotts website: [url='https://www.accursedfarms.com/News.php']https://www.accursedfarms.com/News.php[/url]
Here is the new Civil Protection video, Morning Patrol: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1k15NP2cW08']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1k15NP2cW08[/url]

item.title: New Civil Protection
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
I like how in the end Mike is pick up the gun beside him to shoot the houndeye while he is lying down.

item.title: New Civil Protection
item.dc:creator: El_Chubba_Chubba
item.description:
meh…I didn’t find this episode that funny.

There simply wasn’t enough funny! And unlike the other episodes there was no main plot or theme to be funny.

item.title: New Civil Protection

item.description:
Haha, was the the beta houndeye at the end? Also, Ross Scott said he would continue Freeman’s Mind after this CP, so I guess I have something else to look forward to.
